fields.description:
Notes: Indecisive, want to schedule a call next week and have the IS help me with a scoping call!

Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15g_C_xAl34kWha6A5z_4pDuREwqt9vbKNBhHP5tFdPU/edit#gid=100944861

Notes: MSP Resource Group, potential key account. Has contacts to bring over and automations to recreate from active campaign and infusion soft. He's incredibly sharp and is looking to get his two test clients off the ground as a test run. Per Cam, Stephen will be Integration Specialist

https://app.frontapp.com/open/top_1v21b

Brado is a full-service agency with several offices throughout the country. They specialize in creative growth, business transformation, brand activation and digital intelligence.

Success Plan: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZqPzxHZa2ywgNMh8wET0i7sCWUFPCXipf-JugQ4kQPE/edit|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZqPzxHZa2ywgNMh8wET0i7sCWUFPCXipf-JugQ4kQPE/edit]

Notes: New process, but will require a follow up call (at least with OS) as she wants to review with her team first what Integration should set up.

Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UWLQcY__RB4DgJY4gtF0ls8FwNv44ZBv1rySN4BiMGk/edit#gid=100944861

Notes: Used hubspot, keeping it not losing it. Wanted to use integration for preparo, but it turns out they were an agency partner that he was trying to bring on as a client. Melissa spoke with Cam who says this will not be possible as far as setting that up. I advised him that until we figure out if we can or can't bring on Preparo under their agency account, then we should proceed with the integration scoping call for his account at which point we will likely have a concrete answer on if the first client is possible. There is a potential 2nd client coming on board so it is possible he may pivot and want to use it for them too.
Notes: Needs a Zapier integration to create SharpSpring leads upon event registration. Also needs to import contacts and link forms.
Success Plan needed
Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kjH13kFLOe2sPtOjZYCirZNL85k9jLvO7TpDOYbsfgQ/edit#gid=100944861
Notes: Have a Google sheet to import, going to read through the integration sheet ahead of the call to brainstorm.
Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iYbQWqkXN-l6JKNEXElt-2mOFObNUvM-5CR1ssoWsD8/edit#gid=100944861
Notes: Contact import, ClickFunnels integration (forms are in ClickFunnels, move to SharpSpring), Active Campaign Workflows.
Notes: Website: openpalmlaw.com Form: https://openpalmlaw.com/contact-us/ and Free consultation on home page Using WordPress and MailChimp for form builder Pipedrive export .CSV to import to SHSP.
Notes: Forms, Workflows.
Notes: Coming over from Pipedrive, have CRM data to import. Have a secondary list of contacts they would like imported and added to a list. Would like their form integrated.
Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bizrid5LBz_j229qFgip8T-Pt4zdQv_3GiN_mJmP9e4/edit#gid=100944861

Notes: Contact import, custom fields, forms recreated, might have some integrations with Zapier & PieSync They are very familiar with MA - primary user used to work at Pardot. They are using SHSP as an alternative solution for their clients who don't need SalesForce.

Notes: New integration process. Has a .CSV to of contacts to import and a form to recreate. When we worked through the Success Plan, he was planning to use integration on behalf of a client but that client won't be added for another month (he's located in Italy). Going to book a call to revisit his specific agency goals and finish the Success Plan.

Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1P28LwUs7OVKf_7pae5BIl97HqqH2rLzRqBSPDaeKm94/edit#gid=100944861

Notes: going to need help cleaning up list before import, comes from mailchimp and has another CRM they are going to import data from, might only import data from mailchimp, advised some list cleaning services 2.5 year age on some contacts in database, mixture of B2B and B2C, going to send automation cookbook, google ads, social, no prior automation software, wants to use sharpspring API to connect ERP software, self directed for that endeavor

Notes: Steve has conducted their client import already but Charles let me know that the tags they typically would use to group their accounts by state didn't pull in. May need to reimport and make sure that those come in the way that they like. Steve is the technical contact that will need to correspond with the integration team.

Success Plan: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RpUpoNthWsd9LX-6qvdswIzwDCbOxLSXzc8L2gcVxvc/edit#gid=100944861

https://app.frontapp.com/open/top_2jki7
Notes: They are in Australia - so will either need to be communicated with via email or a very late call. The are interested in automations, list segmentation, etc.
